Subject: Re: Interrogation/Clean up/Terrorcons
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron looks around, everyone was here but Autofire. "Yes, I want you to
all go and position yourselves close to the Maximal base, just out of range
of their scanners. Then wait, and dont fire anything until I give Autofire
the signal, then, unleash a torrent on the Maximals. I want them totally
occupied, so I can follow the rest of the plan. Do not let any of them
leave, and give them a very rough ride. But, this is just a diversion, so
dont go getting any of yourselves killed. Do I make myself clear?" he
finishes, hoping he explained it well enough.
